item.title: Stock Futures Rise to Start New Year
item.description: Technology stocks were leading gains in premarket trading, with chip stocks and cryptocurrency-linked names rising.

item.title: Sterling Extends Losses Against Dollar After U.K. PMI Data
item.description: Sterling extended losses versus the dollar after a key measure of U.K. manufacturing activity was revised down further into contractionary territory.

item.title: Big Retail Gets Bigger as Smaller Players Struggle
item.description: Walmart, Amazon and Costco are growing faster than the rest of retail and investing to stay ahead.

item.title: Oil Prices Rise on Chinese Demand Optimism
item.description: Oil rose with optimism boosted by Chinese leader Xi Jinping’s annual New Year’s address in which he said the country is on an upward trajectory.

item.title: Gold Futures Rise, Starting 2025 on Positive Note
item.description: Gold futures rose, beginning the new year on a positive note, as investors await fresh catalysts to decide the direction of precious metals.
